name: Here's The Kicker
description:
Here's The Kicker is a small arcade game about kicking a ball as far as possible. The further you go, the more money you make, which you can use to unlock upgrades, change how the game works, and customize your ball, creating new and varied ways to play.

Note: Here's The Kicker will release 'soon' on Windows, Linux, and Web. However, it will be $1.00 on those platforms. If you'd like to play it free, please click below to get an ad-supported version on google play.
